17class PARAMS_API ColorMap : public ParamsBase {
18public:
19 class PARAMS_API Color {
20 public:
21 Color();
22 Color(float h, float s, float v);
23 Color(double h, double s, double v);
24 Color(const Color &color);
25
26 void toRGB(float *rgb) const;
27
28 void hue(float h) { _hue = h; }
29 float hue() const { return _hue; }
30
31 void sat(float s) { _sat = s; }
32 float sat() const { return _sat; }
33
34 void val(float v) { _val = v; }
35 float val() const { return _val; }
36
37 private:
38 float _hue;
39 float _sat;
40 float _val;
41 };

55 TFInterpolator::type GetInterpType() const
56 {
57 long defaultv = TFInterpolator::diverging;
58 return (TFInterpolator::type)GetValueLong(_interpTypeTag, defaultv);
59 }
60 void SetInterpType(TFInterpolator::type t);
61 void SetUseWhitespace(bool enabled);
62 bool GetUseWhitespace() const;
63
64 int numControlPoints() const { return (int)(GetControlPoints().size() / 4); }
65
66 Color controlPointColor(int index) const;
67 void controlPointColor(int index, Color color);
68
69 float controlPointValue(int index) const; // Data Coordinates

77 int addNormControlPoint(float normValue, Color color);

79
80 void move(int index, float delta);
81

84 Color getDivergingColor(float ratio, float index) const;
85 Color getCorrectiveDivergingColor(float ratio, float index) const;
86
87 // Method to obtain the control points as a double vector, with
88 // 4 entries for each control point
89 // in the order hue,sat,value, datavalue
90 vector<double> GetControlPoints() const;
91
92 void SetControlPoints(const vector<double> &controlPoints);
93
98 //
99 void SetDataBounds(const vector<double> &bounds);
100 vector<double> GetDataBounds() const;
101
102 float minValue() const { return (GetDataBounds()[0]); }
103 float maxValue() const { return (GetDataBounds()[1]); }
104
105 void Reverse();
106
107 // Get static string identifier for this params class
108 //
109 static string GetClassType() { return ("ColorMapParams"); }
110
111public:
112 static const string _controlPointsTag;
113 static const string _interpTypeTag;
114 static const string _useWhitespaceTag;
115 static const string _dataBoundsTag;
116
117private:
118 int leftIndex(float val) const;
119};
120
121class PARAMS_API ARGB {
122public:
123 ARGB(int r, int g, int b) { _argbvalue = ((r & 255) << 16) | ((g & 255) << 8) | (b & 255); }
124
125private:
126 unsigned int _argbvalue;
127};
128}; // namespace VAPoR
